subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Eight holes into the last round of the Mercedes-Benz Championship, Geoff Ogilvy’s six-stroke lead had all but vanished, but he rallied to win the $1.12 million prize.
snippet: Eight holes into the last round of the Mercedes-Benz Championship, Geoff Ogilvy’s six-stroke lead had all but vanished, but he rallied to win the $1.12 million prize.
